meaningMnemonic: On the <radical>roof</radical> is your <radical>heart</radical>. OR! In a <radical>net</radical> in the <radical>street</radical>. Which would you <kanji>rather</kanji>?
readingMnemonic: As you try to decide which you'd <kanji>rather</kanji> have, your <reading>neigh</reading>bors (ねい) come out and grab the heart out of your hands.
